name: T Q
review: i visited seoraksan during the pandemic at the end of apr 2022 and went up via the ulsanbawi route  it is recommended that you get the naver map to help you plan in advance  but the road signs there are pretty clear  it is also advisable to arrive earlier before 9 am as it tends to get really crowded after 10  that was what i experienced when i descended the mountain  do also note the the price of entrance ticket is now 4500 won  you could get there with bus 7 if you live near the coastal area  and the bus comes every 20 min or so  journey took about an hour to reach the seorakdong entrance  be rewarded by the beautiful scenery

name: Bryan Rosenraouch
review: seoraksan is the highest mountain in the taebaek mountain range in the gangwon province in eastern south korea  it is located in a national park near the city of sokcho  after the hallasan volcano on jeju island and jirisan in the south  seoraksan is the third highest mountain in south korea  the daechongbong peak of seoraksan reaches 1 708 meters  5 603 feet   the mountain is sometimes considered the backbone of south korea  i recommend to bring with you enough drinks and food as the walk and climbing to the top is long which takes ten hours but it is worth every minute with all the nature and the unusual and unforgettable views

name: Caramel Latte
review: fantastic experience  one of the most attractive mountains to visit in korea republic  i highly recommend to visit

name: Ruslman
review: we will be back to mt  seorak   this place was absolutely beautiful   there was something for everyone  sightseeing  hiking  eating and shopping   we spent the whole day hiking trails and enjoying the outdoors   we did take the gondola ride to the top as well for some beautiful views of the surrounding area   i would recommend doing that first as the lines will only get longer as the time gets later   the views at seoraksan left me speechless  so i will let the pictures do the talking   enjoy

name: Chiranjeev Maini
review: simply brilliant  go for a weekend getaway with your friends  get lost in the woods  enjoy cable car to reach one of the peaks  not a lot of people venture out to see a buddhist temple  however if you are an adventure enthusiast  do not miss visiting the temple  you can also choose multiple tails for hiking or trekking  multiple shops are open at the base of national park to try out a lot of good food and beverages  it can get a little humid during summers but still it s worth a visit  i would definitely visit again

name: Camila
review: definitely amazing  it is crowded during fall season  october  november  but i recommend going anyways because the colors are beautiful  entrance fee is 3 500 won  the cable car that goes up a hill  gwongeumseong fortress  not to ulsanbawi  is 10 000 won  you can see cute squirrels all over the park  there are shelters were you can stay the night to continue hiking the next day  it is opened from 9am to sunset

name: Ree Anderson
review: beautiful part with much to see  we went on a 4 hour hike up to the mountain rocks which look like a picket fence  only do this trail if you re physically fit as there are many stairs and rockery  we went on a cloudy rainy day but it was still enjoyable

name: Malcolm Yow
review: was blown away by the nature and awesomeness  would of spent a whole day here if i knew it was going to be this good  even though i went in dec it was still great  it would be even better in autumn or spring  pictures don t do it justice

name: Jessica Horine
review: very user friendly park esp for western  english speaking  visitors  all signs also in english  maps available in english  naver map system gets you here easily if you are driving  parking looks difficult if you get here past 10am though  we stayed at the kensington and walked in and saw lines of cars daily  entrance fee is 3 500kw per day and the hikes are very well marked and traveled  we only did outer seoraksan trails and it was crowded but pleasant on a september weekend  everyone appreciated our limited hangul  many hiking clubs trekking about  plenty of food   snacks and trinkets for sale  the gondola is a must  ulsanbowi a must  waterfalls a little anticlimactic

name: Nuhyil
review: great place for hiking there are lots to explore if you are up for a day trip this is the place there is a cable car service to the top of mountain which is 10k per head kinda worth it

name: Rendy Bahri
review: this national park is very beautiful and nice  u can take bus from sokcho express bus terminal no 7 or 7 1 to reach here  it will be last stop so dont worry  there are 4 5 route that u can do for hiking  i climbed for the ulsanbawi track  it was amazing hard track in last 1 2km  so if u decided to hike this route prepare your food  but it was totally worth it  if u dont have much time or power just use cable car and will see amazing scenery

name: Sam Fy
review: very beautiful mountain in seoul  you need to book a tour package or take a bus to reach here as is very fat from the city  it takes around 2 and a half hour from the seoul city but is worth for a long ride to view this magnificent scenery  we went on april so there is cherry blossom on bottom of mountain  beautiful  there are few route to go top of the mountain  you will need to plan your time well  there is a cable car ride too  cost you 10k krw for return journey  you will walk pass by a big buddha statue     is awesome

name: Leony Maranatha (Oh Eun Sun)
review: i visited this place during early winter and it was really nice  wished to come back here again during winter and spring

name: Bruno Croissant
review: a fantastic national park with a lot of very interesting walks and stunning views of beautiful korean scenery  korean people love hiking and trails are well maintained

name: D. Pops
review: like jirisan  seoraksan is a very difficult mountain to hike  it s a 10 mile hike that takes at least 10 hours from the sokcho entrance to the osaek ri village  there is beautiful scenery everywhere you look  the view from the peak daecheonbong is breathtaking  if you re up for a challenge  seoraksan will challenge you  i had a blast but i must admit i feel pretty darn sore

name: Marcos Hadinoto
review: one of south korea iconic place mt seoraksan   it is an amazing place loaded with beautiful and pristine nature   could not ask for a better weather and perfect timing for the sakura bloom   this is a must to visit if you are visiting south korea

name: Vron
review: beautiful place in south korea  came for 2 days for ulsanbawi   towangseong falls  easily accessible by local bus  a must visit in sokcho  south korea

name: Mel
review: beautiful views during the autumn season  recommended route from osaek to sokcho for the daecheongbong peak possible to complete in one day

name: SemBe Be
review: beautiful scenery  cable car can help you reach peak of mountain

name: Nordiana Mat Salleh
review: beautiful place to visit but not suit for the old folks because you need stamina and energy to hike up there

name: Vika Kinanti
review: must visit this mountain again  very nice track for freshtracking while chit chat with your friends  the trails are nicely done and the park is well organized with maps and directions and signs  i went here from seoul since the morning and get back in the afternoon the public transportation good

name: Yoga Braina
review: a wonderful park for nature lovers       especially in fall     the colors of the trees are incredible    can t move from here    convenient parking     staying

name: Md Alamin Hossain
review: the best park i have ever been in autum  definitely must visit place in autum on october

name: Joseph Joson
review: a must place to visit when you go to korea the sceneries is beautiful and amazing

name: Ara Jaingue
review: very impressive mountain  well maintained park and super friendly staff  the trails are nicely done and the park is well organized with maps and directions and signs  the young and old can choose which trails to hike and which side of the mountains and falls to see  we stayed overnight in the area so we can hike and enjoy the mountain and the view for 2 days  i d recommend that you do the same  it s worth it  especially if you re a nature lover

name: Lim Parni
review: very nicely place  visit at winter time  omg so beautiful

name: Jawad Ahmed
review: must visit place   if you enjoy nature than it is paradise for you

name: Kyle Christian
review: fantastic imagery and clear  well defined tracks  plenty of benches and water refills along the way

name: Soursweet Apple
review: one of the top mountain in korea  enjoy the mother nature at the most clean and primeval area in korea

name: sasithara sethanandha
review: cable car ride is epic   worth the visit  we also had ice cream up there in the winter time

name: Hanna Kurniawati
review: in autum  very nice and comfort place for fam picnic  lovely

name: Dr D V Subba Reddy
review: beautiful national park  good place to relax in the weekends  there are multiple trekking trails which are very good for nature freaks  during winter its like snow blanket everywhere  trails are slippery so need proper equipment  cable car is good to enjoy view from hill top   from where you can see the beach and sea  need to be careful which going uphill from the cable car

name: Ben Minus
review: very nice stay  my wife and i took our teenaged daughter and her best friend here for the weekend a couple of years ago and we loved it  we tried to do everything that was available at the location  the rooms are really nice and the food was also  we spent the whole weekend exploring and taking in the sights  it was a physically demanding to climb and walk so places but nothing that the average person couldn t do  not sure if i would go in the middle of summer  we went in september and it was pretty warm still  i highly recommend taking a trip here

name: Benjamin MICHONNET
review: really good national park with plenty of small or long hikes  just need tobget there early because it can be really crowded  specially during weekends

name: Jan-H. Mo
review: a nice side step from sokcho and worth it  the park offers nature and culture at the same time  the cable car takes you up for some stunning views  take bus 7 or 7 1 from the city center  admission fee to the park is 3 500 won per adult  bus ticket costs 1 400 won  enjoy

name: Mandy Brown
review: great place  clesn park with a lot of wild life  parts of the trails can be very tricky and difficult to navigate  at least a 10 hour hike when going round trip from gate to peak  luckily several shelters along the way to buy supplies or to sleep for the night

name: Musa Jawad
review: one of the best place for hike lovers  do visit in autumn when the leaves are colorful

name: Myrene Lee
review: stunning view on top  highly recommend to ride the cable car

name: Fang Leow
review: i will be back next autumn

name: sooBB39
review: it is a place where you can see wonderful scenery at any time of the four seasons  the beginning of mt  seorak is an easy way to climb the mountain  making it easy for children and senior citizens to enjoy hiking  the higher you go  the faster the slope becomes  the more difficult it is  but you can see the beautiful scenery  if you go up high  you d better take a light jumper because the top is cool  also  cable cars are operating to allow the elderly and those who are unable to climb the mountain to see  if you visit gangwon do  i recommend you to visit there

name: Radver Lee
review: very beautiful park  some very challenging hikes  bring hiking stick  preferably 2 hiking stick per person  one in each hand  and wear hiking shoes  i couldn t finish all the hikes due to poor preparation on my part  wanted so much to see everything here  so beautiful

name: Alex Zhong
review: didnt go to the top but a nice place to visit there was a huge budda and some nice places to see and find

name: Edwin Benard
review: beautiful park   hikes

name: Daniel Estrada
review: i m a 23 years old guy  i went there with my friend and walked to the daechaengbong peak  11km  trough the advanced trail  it took us 5h to go up and 4h to go down  we had a blast but we can still feel the pain in our legs 1 day after  use climbing hiking shoes     i would not recommend to inexperienced walkers to do it in 1 day  up and down  like we did  bring a lot of water with you and some food  the sight is worth it

name: Alexandra Crowder
review: gorgeous scenery and very well maintained trails  easy to use online booking of overnight huts  all round a great visit for one day or a multi day hike  even for foreigners who speak no korean

name: Razin Ahmad Nizar
review: we went during winter and the view was incredible  transport to the park is also convenient  we took the taxi to the park gate from sokcho express bus terminal which costed us 15000won  going back we took the local bus 7 1 but missed our stop due to the announcement being in korean  overall a satisfying day trip from seoul

name: T梳죓 Tr梳쬷 C척ng
review: there s cherry blossoms all over the sky  over flower

name: Julie Hn
review: seoraksan park is one of the most beautiful park i ve ever visited  it s truly magical during fall  there are a lot of trails   you should definitely do ulsanbawi  but also the waterfall and the cave one

name: Chen Ling Ling
review: very nice place and advisable for all to travel there during weekdays instead of weekend  weekend will be too pack and if you love to take pictures at ease then go on weekdays

name: Adaira Gonz찼lez
review: beautiful place  trails for easier hikes and also very challanging jones  good to come for a day with family or also to stay longer and see all the different areas

name: Rafael James Ompad
review: very nice

name: Michael Catrysse
review: beautiful park for young and old  the paths are well maintained and mostly consist of man made trails  expect stairways  bridges and stone steps

name: Jozefien
review: beautiful and easy accessible  the gondola makes it easy to get up and down the mountain  views from the top are spectacular

name: Anutra Leela
review: great view and so much fun

name: er chan

name: Aipie
review: seoraksan is so magical in the winter  because there s nothing quite serene as seeing the mountain and everything covered in a fresh sheet of snow  overnight stay is highly recommended

name: woon liang Aw
review: beautiful park   come here on a weekday to feel the serenity  there is a beautiful huge buddha statue

name: Jordi Sanchez
review: if you have time in korea  you should visit this amazing national park  great views and local food  chose well when you go to avoid crowds

review: this park is the most stunning if you visit during the fall season as the leaves change color

review: seoraksan national park is a national park in south korea  it listed by the south korean government with unesco as a tentative world heritage site

name: Jan-Michael Buckowitz
review: seoraksan is   in all seasons   an incredibly beautiful nature park  the diversity of which cannot be explored in a few days or weeks  the beauty of nature is in a constant state of change  which also shows different facets depending on the weather  i feel privileged to be able to live in this area      seoraksan ist   zu allen jahreszeiten    ein unglaublich sch ner naturpark  dessen vielfalt man nicht in einigen tagen oder wochen erkunden kann  die sch nheit der natur ist in einem st ndigen wandel  der auch abh ngig von dem jeweiligen wetter immer wieder unterschiedliche facetten zeigt  ich empfinde es als privileg  in dieser gegend leben zu d rfen

name: PEI YUN Lee
review: beautiful mountain view  it s a pity that the time is not right  there are no flowers or green leaves  but very comfortable

name: Quentin Piot
review: beautiful park known as the most beautiful in korea  many walks are available for all levels  from beginners to experts  trail  trekking   days would be needed to travel the park in its entirety  in addition  the entrance is very cheap  no excuse not to go there      superbe parc r put  comme le plus beau de cor e  de nombreuses promenades sont disponibles pour tous les niveaux  des d butants aux experts  trail  trek   des jours seraient n cessaires pour parcourir le parc dans son int gralit   de plus  l entr e est tr s peu ch re  aucune excuse pour ne pas y aller

name: Laura Kunegel
review: very beautiful national park with courses for all levels and different durations  i also recommend it for the view we have on the mountains  the buddha statue is huge and very beautiful  it looks very small next to it      tr s beau parc national avec des parcours pour tout les niveaux et dur es diff rentes  je le recommande aussi pour la vue qu on a sur les montagne  la statue de bouddha est immense et tr s belle  on   l air tout petit a c t

name: 璵듿컦椰?
review: it s very happy to have a snow covered mountain  but it s a good time to insist on going to the bus  one person s won is about 10 000 yuan  and you can see the beautiful scenery along the way                                                10000

name: T Lorena Alcala
review: the park is something that you definitely have to visit when going to south korea  the view from ulsanbawi rock is incredible  it is worth the whole tour      el parque es algo que definitivamente se tiene que visitar al ir a corea del sur la vista desde ulsanbawi rock es incre ble  vale la pena todo el recorrido

name: Samuel Budi Kusuma
review: this place is 4 hours by road from seoul  it is highly recommended to ride the cable car and enjoy the view from above  it would be very beautiful if the weather was foggy  like what i experienced when i was there     tempat ini berjarak 4jam perjalanan darat dari kota seoul  sangat disarankan untuk naik cable car dan menikmati pemandangan dari atas  akan sangat indah bila cuaca sedang berkabut  seperti yang saya alami saat sedang kesana

name: Anung Banindra Tama
review: very beautiful     every foreign tourist must come here to see how natural and beautiful this place is     sangat indah  setiap wisatawan manca negara harus kesini untuk melihat betapa natural dan indahnya tempat ini

name: kanlayanee intaraprasert
review: traveling from seoul to sokcho is convenient with a bus  takes about 3 4 hours                                                              3 4

review: beautiful place  mt  seorak in korea     tempat yg indah  gunung seorak di korea

review: the atmosphere is good for this season

name: Pamela Trincado
review: the ascent is quite simple  except for the last 300 meters that allow you to reach the summit and require a bit of ability to climb  especially in winter when there is ice  crampons are recommended  but are not always necessary      la salita   abbastanza semplice  eccetto gli ultimi 300 metri che permettono di raggiungere la vetta e richiedono un po  di abilit  nella salita  soprattutto in inverno quando c   ghiaccio  i ramponi sono consigliati  ma non sono sempre necessari

name: Falk Petro
review: very nice and worth seeing park  the paths are well prepared  but you should have reasonably good condition  in part  many hundreds of steps are to be climbed in one go      sehr sch ner und sehenswerter parkt  die wege sind gut pr pariert  man sollte aber einigerma en gute kondition haben  teilweise sind viele hundert stufen am st ck zu steigen

name: 蓼긺럦夜?
review: this is also one of the scenes of the korean drama  winter love song   the maple leaves of seorak mountain look softer and more layered  seoraksan is one of the famous mountains in south korea and one of the first places where maple leaves turn red every year  in autumn  headed by daqing peak  the highest peak of seorak mountain  the maple leaves along the main climbing routes of seorak mountain dyed the mountain into a red picture  which was very beautiful  from the mountain peaks to the winding ridges  the red is spread out a little  and it looks far like fire

name: I MSS
review: perfect for trekking  park located in a beautiful environment  increased the charm with the buddhist temple and facilities  i did not like the large number of tourists  many people  who visit it  very crowded      perfecto para hacer trekking  parque ubicado en un entorno precioso  aumentado el encanto con el templo budista y las instalaciones  no me gust  la gran cantidad de turistas  mucha gente  que lo visita  muy masificado
